Tutoring

Free tutoring, wherever you are.

InterSTEM's team of dedicated tutors is offering academic assistance in math, sciences, and other subjects

All tutoring sessions will be held entirely online, completely free of charge. Sign up and view current course offerings on our Modulus page!

Sign up

  • Frequently Asked Questions

How is InterSTEM's tutoring service completely free?

InterSTEM's tutors are volunteers, and our partner, Modulus, allow us to teach our curriculum on a user-friendly platform.

Where will tutoring take place?

Sign up on our Modulus page to take an online tutoring course in a specific subject, and join our Discord server for general homework help.

Developed by InterSTEM Tech Team.
